title: Art attack
creator_credit: Media Merchants, Television South, Tim Edmunds, Neil Buchanan and Nick Bigsby
brief_description: Learn how to be creative with art - techniques which seem complex are explained simply and with great illustration - be creative in a fun way, using cheap, everyday objects. In this episode you can learn how to make a pastry face mask, create your very own ancient treasure map, and design a poster out of your name.
creator_credit_for_label: Media Merchants, Television South, Tim Edmunds, Neil Buchanan and Nick Bigsby
